00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Data;
00024 using System.Collections;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Database;
00029 
00030 using NyFolder;
00031 using NyFolder.Utils;
00032 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.BuddyList {
00035     public class UsersTable : DbTable {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Constructors
00038         // ============================================
00040         public UsersTable() : base("users") {
00041         }
00042 
00043         // ============================================
00044         // PUBLIC Methods
00045         // ============================================
00047         public string[] GetAllUsers (int id) {
00048             string sql = "SELECT username FROM users WHERE id=@Id;";
00049             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00050             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00051             return(db.ExecuteReadStrings(sql, sqlParams));
00052         }
00053 
00055         public string[] GetAcceptedUsers (int id) {
00056             string sql = "SELECT username FROM users WHERE id=@Id AND accept=1;";
00057             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00058             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00059             return(db.ExecuteReadStrings(sql, sqlParams));
00060         }
00061 
00063         public string[] GetNotAcceptedUsers (int id) {
00064             string sql = "SELECT username FROM users WHERE id=@Id AND accept=0;";
00065             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00066             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00067             return(db.ExecuteReadStrings(sql, sqlParams));
00068         }
00069 
00070         public void Remove (string username) {
00071             string sql = "DELETE from users WHERE username=@Name;";
00072             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00073             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00074             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00075         }
00076 
00077         public void RemoveAll (int id) {
00078             string sql = "DELETE from users WHERE id=@Id;";
00079             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00080             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00081             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00082         }
00083 
00084         public int Insert (int id, string username, bool accept) {
00085             try {
00086                 string sql = "INSERT INTO users VALUES (@Id, @Name, @Accept);";
00087                 Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00088                 sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00089                 sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00090                 sqlParams.Add("@Accept", (accept == true) ? 1 : 0);
00091                 return(db.ExecuteNonQueryGetID(sql, sqlParams));
00092             } catch {
00093                 return(-1);
00094             }
00095         }
00096 
00097         public void SetAccept (int id, string username, bool accept) {
00098             string sql = "UPDATE users SET accept=@Accept WHERE username=@Name AND id=@Id;";
00099             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00100             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00101             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00102             sqlParams.Add("@Accept", (accept == true) ? 1 : 0);
00103             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00104         }
00105 
00106         public bool GetAccept (int id, string username) {
00107             string sql = "SELECT accept FROM users WHERE username=@Name AND id=@Id;";
00108             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00109             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00110             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00111             return(db.ExecuteReadInt(sql, sqlParams) == 1 ? true : false);
00112         }
00113 
00114         public bool IsPresent (int id, string username) {
00115             string sql = "SELECT accept FROM users WHERE username=@Name AND id=@Id;";
00116             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00117             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00118             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00119             return(db.ExecuteReadInt(sql, sqlParams) >= 0 ? true : false);
00120         }
00121 
00122         // ============================================
00123         // PROTECTED Methods
00124         // ============================================
00125         // +----------+------------------+
00126         // | id       | INTEGER          |
00127         // +----------+------------------+
00128         // | username | VARCHAR(32 + 24) |
00129         // +----------+------------------+
00130         // | accept   | INTEGER          |
00131         // +----------+------------------+
00132         protected override void CreateAccountsTable() {
00133             string sql = "CREATE TABLE users (" +
00134                             "id INTEGER NOT NULL," +
00135                             "username VARCHAR(56) NOT NULL," +
00136                             "accept INTEGER NOT NULL," +
00137                             "PRIMARY KEY (id, username)" +
00138                          ");";
00139             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql);
00140         }
00141 
00142     }
00143 }
